about_the_game:
About the Demo Version

The Demo version of the game will be available for a limited time free trial from AM 02:00(GMT), February 14 to AM 02:00(GMT), March 4. Players can download and play the basic content of the Terran Steam Civilization for free. After the free trial period ends, you will no longer be able to log in to the game, the galaxy map will be closed, and all the star field information opened up by the trial version users will be cleared.

Free Demo: Download and experience the game for free from February 24 to March 3.

Experience race: The Terran race with steam civilization among the three major races.

Data deletion: After the free trial period ends, all user information will be deleted, and the user ID, nickname, and star field opened up in the demo game will not be inherited to the official version.

In every galaxy of the vast universe, there is always the first immigrant ship that sails toward 

the first colony planet, thus marking the beginning of the grand development of the galaxy.

After this, the shadows of pirates and the light of allies intertwine. Legend has it that finding 

and completing the ancient civilization's unfinished miracle structure at the core of the 

galaxy will unlock the mysterious gateway to a new galaxy. Spurred by the undying call of 

exploration deep within our hearts, the game embarks on this journey...

Develop more planets

Starting with the construction of the first assigned colony planet, continuously explore and

 develop more planets. Develop strategies based on each planet's resource output ratio and

 geographical advantages, select a main planet, and construct a route network to lay a solid

 foundation for the alliance's miracle construction.

Different races have different cities

Each planet has a central city. The construction of the city relies on various functional 

buildings which you can choose and place freely. Some buildings are directly related to the

development direction of the planet. Additionally, you can visit other allies' cities within the 

alliance to learn from their layout arrangements.

Explore and expand the alliance's territory

As an individual player, you can develop additional planets to enhance your economic power. 

As part of an alliance, everyone works together to expand influence in the area, integrating 

the powers of other alliances through non-military and non-war means to achieve growth through fusion. The influence range of the star region is also 

one of the important foundations for constructing miracles.

And create miracles together

The ancient miracle site is hidden deep within the core of a mysterious galaxy. It requires 

everyone to find it first, extend your star region territory towards the miracle, and gather 

collective strength. Ultimately, you will build the most magnificent structure in the galaxy. 

In this process, you will inevitably experience a multitude of rich and colorful events.

name: Let's Build Wonders: Galaxy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 260X/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 470X/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Let’s Build Wonders:Galaxy is a multiplayer cooperative space-building game. In the game, members within each alliance achieve efficient resource sharing and division of labor through trade transportation means. They work to expand their alliance's galactic territory to resist pirate harassment.
